column1: '''''The Tolkien Calendar 1991''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[Unwin Hyman
column2: Unwin Paperbacks]] on [[23 August]] [[1990]]. It features art by [[John Howe]] based on ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Silmarillion]]''.

column1: * Cover - "[[:File:John Howe - Flight to the Ford.jpg
* May - "[[:File:John Howe - The Company Approaches Caradhras.jpg
column2: The Company of the Ring Approaching Caradhras]]"

column1: * June - "[[:File:John Howe - The Death of Glaurung.jpg
* July - "[[:File:John Howe - Flight to the Ford.jpg
* September - "[[:File:John Howe - Glorfindel And The Balrog.jpg
* November - "[[:File:John Howe - Eowyn and the Nazgul.jpg
* ''[[The 1991 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar]]'', published in the USA
